scripts.dev: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go run . || echo 'Go is not installed.'
scripts.build: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go build -o bin/agent . || echo 'Go is not installed.'
scripts.lint: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go vet ./... && go run honnef.co/go/tools/cmd/staticcheck@latest ./... || echo 'Go is not installed.'
scripts.lint:go: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go vet ./... && go run honnef.co/go/tools/cmd/staticcheck@latest ./... || echo 'Go is not installed.'
scripts.format: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go fmt ./... && $(go env GOPATH)/bin/goimports -w . || echo 'Go or goimports is not installed.'
scripts.format:go: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go fmt ./... && $(go env GOPATH)/bin/goimports -w . || echo 'Go or goimports is not installed.'
scripts.test: command -v go >/dev/null 2>&1 && go test ./... || echo 'Go is not installed.'
